definition: erhua variant of 費勁|费劲[fei4 jin4]

sentences.english: Alice said to herself, as well as she could for sneezing.
sentences.chinese: 愛麗絲費勁兒地對自己說，並不停地打着噴嚏。

sentences.english: The dog squeezed himself through the bars of the gate with no difficulty at all.
sentences.chinese: 那條狗毫不費勁兒地從大門柵欄中間鑽了出去。

sentences.english: A wrong approach means a waste of effort.
sentences.chinese: 路子不對等於白費勁兒。
